oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mn(IV) and Co(III)-complexes of –OH–rich ligands possessing O2N, O3N and O4N cores: syntheses, characterization and crystal structures
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DEY, MISHTU
RAO, CHEBROLU P
SAARENKETO, PAULI K
KARI RISSANEN
KOLEHMAINEN, ERKKI
GUIONNEAU, PHILIPPE
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: manganese(iv) complex
cobalt(iii) complex
crystal structure
magnetic moment
hydrogen bonds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mn(IV) and Co(III) complexes of tridentate –OH–rich ligands possessing O2N, O3N and O4N donor sets were synthesized, characterized and their structures were established by single crystal X-ray diffraction, where the binding core is O4N2. In the structurally characterized complexes, the coordination geometry about the metal ion was found to be distorted octahedral.
